group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's so yummy!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, there is no smell to it.
You did well in preparing it.
Thank you!

group_1.textRight: It is a little too salty, I feel,
but after so many things happening today,@I feel like the salt is just right.

group_1.textLeft: S-so it is.
By the way, since you mentioned@that matter,
why did you not try to fight back?
He was just an ordinary person,@so you could have easily overcome him.

group_1.textRight: [wait:0.8][chara:103301:cheek_0][chara:103301:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:103301:lipSynch_1]...There were so many people there that if@I had used any power, I would have stood out.
I did not want any unwanted attention@brought upon myself.

group_1.textLeft: So that is why...
I am terribly sorry; I just rushed in@without thinking...

group_1.textRight: Suddenly running out like that@sure surprised me.
You were about to transform.@Were you scared?

group_1.textLeft: Mmph...blood was rushing to my head...
Thinking you were in danger@scared me...and angered me...
It was foolish of me.

group_1.textRight: Yes it was...[chara:103301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103301:lipSynch_1]is what I would say,
but you were very helpful.@Thank you very much, Lady Nayuta.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: In that way, you are just like your father.
Just as I would expect of him...no,
just as I would expect of@Lady Nayuta Satomi.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes! Thank you!
And with that, you guys have made up!

group_1.textRight: Yes, and you, too, Mikage - I'm sorry@for making you go through this.

group_1.textLeft: I've really looking forward to@our dessert after this.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I will have it ready shortly.

group_1.textLeft: Ah - wait a moment, now.@We are not putting a stop to this mood.

group_1.textRight: What is it?
Is there still more?@You shouldn't be going all out.

group_1.textLeft: I am not going all out. Once I do this,@I will have truly gotten even.
Ta-da! A kusudama and a cake!

group_1.textRight: O-ohh...

group_1.textLeft: Now, Rabi, take this and go for it.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:103301:cheek_0][chara:103301:motion_200][chara:103301:lipSynch_1]There―
[chara:103801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
It spliiit?!
Yeah, it actually split...
I had a bad feeling about this,@but I see it was unfounded.

group_1.textLeft: Naturally. It did take much trial and error.

group_1.textRight: Trial and error...?
You did it, Nayutan!
...[wait:0.8][chara:103801:cheek_0][chara:103801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103801:lipSynch_1]Ah! Nayutan! Look out!
The paper!

group_1.textLeft: Eh?
Ah―! Confetti is on the cake!@It's falling!

group_1.textRight: It ended up a mess, after all!

group_1.textLeft: I-it's still safe. Hurry and pick the tiny pieces@off with the chopsticks!
Urgh... I have been forgiven,
but there is no dignity nor character@in doing this...

group_1.textRight: Rabitan is going to be angry@all over again.

group_1.textLeft: Ehh?! She can't possibly―?!

group_1.textRight: ...Should I be doing something?

group_1.textLeft: We just barely got it all!@Hurry and grab it!

group_1.textCenter: ...[wait:1.2][chara:103301:cheek_0][chara:103301:lipSynch_1]Well, it seems things tend to go wrong@quite often,
but you conveyed your sincerity to me,@Lady Nayuta.
I will continue to admire you until@the final day.

group_1.textLeft: Did you say something?

group_1.textRight: Nothing at all.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...I could have sworn I heard you@say something.

group_1.textRight: Please just move your hands. I will wake you@with the frying pan tomorrow if you don't.

group_1.textLeft: Eep?! I DO NOT want that any longer!
Please forgive meee...
